comment.author: 22948027@N02
comment._content: Text in Norwegian, first picture: Kirken i Grytviken, South Georgia, som er verdens sydligeste kirke - The church in Grytviken, South Georgia, the world's most southernmost church. Under pictures two and three: Begravelse paa South Georgia - 1/8 - 1914 - 'Funeral on South Georgia, August 1, 1914' Husvik Harbour had its own cementary, but only the whaling station at Grytviken further to the South had a church.
